layer.name: dmht_mapmode
layer.onclick: switch(image.depthmap.mapmode,1,2); onloaded(); updatescreen(); if(image.depthmap.mapmode == 1, set(image.depthmap.offset, 0.065); set(image.depthmap.curve, 1.0); , set(image.depthmap.offset, 0.0); set(image.depthmap.curve, 2.0); ); depthmap_helpertools_refresh();

layer.name: dmht_depthcurve
layer.setvar: clamp(var,0.1,3.0); copy(image.depthmap.curve, var); updatescreen(); roundval(tmp,var,3); txtadd(html,'Curve: ',get(tmp));

layer.name: dmht_depthscale
layer.setvar: if(var == 0.0, set(var,0.001)); copy(image.depthmap.scale, var); updatescreen(); roundval(tmp,var,3); txtadd(html,'Scale: ',get(tmp)); calc(floorscale,var / startscale); Math.abs(floorscale); calc(hotspot[dmht_floor].ty, floorlevel * floorscale); updatescreen(); roundval(tmp,hotspot[dmht_floor].ty,0); txtadd(layer[dmht_floorlevel].html,'Floor Level: ',get(tmp),'cm');

layer.name: dmht_showfloor
layer.onloaded: html='Show Reference Floor: ' + (hotspot[dmht_floor].visible ? 'yes' : 'no'); if(hotspot[dmht_floor].visible, layer[dmht_floorlevel].alpha=1.0; layer[dmht_prealign].alpha=1.0; , layer[dmht_floorlevel].alpha=0.5; layer[dmht_prealign].alpha=0.5; );

layer.name: dmht_floorlevel
layer.setvar: copy(hotspot[dmht_floor].ty, var); updatescreen(); roundval(tmp,var,0); txtadd(html,'Floor Offset: ',get(tmp),'cm');
